name: Quest for the Space Waifus
description:
After an accidental launch, the Janitor is now tasked with completing the cargo route of the SS-T54D3R. Travel to different worlds, meet different species, trade with them to fill your cargo bay! But there’s one catch, you do not know how to fly a ship, and flying a ship is hard. Do your best and use your Janitor thriftiness to patch-up hull breaches, fix the ship and avoid getting fined by the space police!

Controls:

Arrow Keys | WASD for Movement

Space Bar | Left Mouse Button for fixing breaches or presenting yourself when close to the breaches/robot.
